--- select_singer_with_column_and_asterisk.sql
SELECT
  SingerId,
  *
FROM
  Singers

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  9,
          end:  17,
          Name: "SingerId",
        },
      },
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 21,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:    23,
      Source: &parser.TableName{
        Table: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  30,
          end:  37,
          Name: "Singers",
        },
        Hint:   (*parser.Hint)(nil),
        As:     (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT SingerId, * FROM Singers
